articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The attacker has offered to try to "come to an agreement" over the nearly $200 million worth of crypto it swiped last week.
articles.title: ‘No Intention of Keeping What Is Not Ours,’ Euler Finance Hacker Says

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: DeSantis said CBDCs are all about “surveilling” and “controlling” the populace.
articles.title: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis Introduces State Legislation Banning CBDCs

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Immutable zkEVM will pair Polygon’s tech and Immutable’s gaming platform for an Ethereum-centric home for Web3 game developers.
articles.title: Polygon, Immutable Partner for New zkEVM Ethereum Gaming Network

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Paul Grewal said the FTX collapse was a huge setback for the entire crypto industry, specifically from the regulatory standpoint of view.
articles.title: Coinbase Chief Legal Officer: What FTX Did Was ‘Flat-Out Fraud’

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Leaked emails show FTX.US’ policy head Mark Wetjen “begging the federal government to regulate us.”
articles.title: New Emails Show FTX Met With FDIC Months Before Its Collapse: Report

articles.author: Robert Stevens
articles.description: One of the most popular Ethereum scaling solutions, Arbitrum aims to speed up transaction times and cut fees on the Ethereum blockchain.
articles.title: What Is Arbitrum? Speeding Up Ethereum Using Optimistic Rollups

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The leading cryptocurrency is trading at its highest level this year, with some experts predicting further bullish price action.
articles.title: Bitcoin Soars 30% Over the Week as Global Banks Roil

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: With Arbitrum’s latest airdrop hitting the market on Thursday, analysts are scrambling to put a price on the latest layer-2 token.
articles.title: Arbitrum’s Airdrop Is Just Around the Corner—How Much Will ARB Be Worth?

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Balaji Srinivasan predicted that Bitcoin would reach $1 million in around 90 days.
articles.title: How Realistic Is Former Coinbase CTO’s $2 Million Bitcoin Wager on US Hyperinflation?

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Employees behind the decentralized finance dashboard are split on the future of the leading llama-based crypto brand.
articles.title: DefiLlama Team Fractures Over Potential Token Launch

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Joselit Ramirez is out, Anabel Pereira Fernandez is in, as SUNACRIP is restructured by decree of President Nicolas Maduro.
articles.title: Venezuela's Crypto Regulator, Targeted with $5M Bounty, Removed and Arrested

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Also, a bold public bet over whether U.S. hyperinflation is coming, and bringing with it sky-high Bitcoin prices.
articles.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Pundits Perform Post-Mortem on Crypto Bank Crisis

articles.author: Daniel Roberts
articles.description: France's first lady showed up at an NFT convention and even minted an NFT. Europe is welcoming crypto as the US pushes it out.
articles.title: When Brigitte Macron Came to NFT Paris

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The draining of $200 million from Euler is one of the biggest losses in DeFi for some time. Still, the "money legos" narrative isn't dead.
articles.title: How Damaging Was the Euler Hack to DeFi's 'Money Legos' Promise?

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The game grants Polygon NFT holders exclusive access and perks, but no in-game advantages.
articles.title: YouTuber Dr. Disrespect Previews Deadrop Gameplay to Thousands of Viewers

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The two leading coins more than made up for losses racked up during last week’s crypto banking crash.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin, Ethereum Post Mega Rallies After Banking Intervention

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The unreleased features suggest the tech giant is considering a deeper move into Web3.
articles.title: Crypto Wallet Prototype Discovered Inside Microsoft Edge Browser

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Deep inside metaverse game The Sandbox, a Decrypt reporter spent a solitary St. Patrick’s Day afternoon searching fruitlessly for belonging.
articles.title: Loneliest Pub in the Metaverse: St. Patrick’s Day in The Sandbox

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Helium faces more troubles after the world's biggest crypto exchange decided to delist its native token.
articles.title: Helium Plunges 23% After Binance Delisting, Solana Delay

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Web3 metaverse platform Oncyber is adding an AI tool that lets users change up 3D spaces by typing out ideas.
articles.title: OpenAI’s GPT Is Helping Turn Text Into Custom Metaverse Worlds

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: If Coinbase does expand overseas, it would more directly compete with Binance, which generates roughly 10 times more volume than Coinbase per day.
articles.title: Coinbase Is Speeding Up Plans to Expand Outside the US

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: It’s like Diablo 3 meets Animal Crossing, but with zombies (and NFTs). We go hands-on with the upcoming Web3 game from Gala Games.
articles.title: 'The Walking Dead: Empires' Preview: A Casual Zombie RPG With NFT Perks

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Stocks slumped today, but Bitcoin is doing remarkably well—all while the banking industry faces a crisis.
articles.title: Bitcoin Rallies as Silicon Valley Bank Parent Files for Bankruptcy

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: New rules requiring crypto to be identified separately on tax returns will provide "greater transparency" on who is declaring gains, experts say.
articles.title: What the UK's New Crypto Tax Rules Mean for Holders

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The now-patched vulnerability could have enabled an attacker to extract a full private key, bypassing all of BitGo's security features.
articles.title: Fireblocks Discloses Critical Vulnerability in BitGo Ethereum Wallets

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The FDIC has reportedly stated that interested buyers in the now-defunct Signature Bank must also give up their ties to crypto.
articles.title: FDIC Denies Report That Signature Bank Buyer Must Give Up on Crypto

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: Bitcoin’s price has broken above $26,000, as stock market gains and a declining dollar yield saw investors flock to risk-on assets.
articles.title: Bitcoin Tops $26,000 as Market Sentiment Turns Risk-On

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Meme-loving revelers will soon travel to Sakura, Japan to meet Kabosu, star of the world-famous Doge meme and inspiration for Dogecoin.
articles.title: DAO Organizes Holy Pilgrimage to Meet the Dogecoin Dog in Japan

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The Web3 golf community claims that it is following through with its original plan to buy a real-world golf course.
articles.title: LinksDAO Wins Bid to Buy Scottish Golf Course, CEO Says

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The lawsuit alleges that several social media influencers solicited the sale of unregistered securities in promoting FTX.
articles.title: YouTube Influencers Slapped With $1 Billion Lawsuit for Promoting FTX

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Bankman-Fried and his inner circle collectively received roughly $3.2 billion in payments and loans, court documents have revealed.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Was Paid $2.2B Mostly From Alameda—Ex-CEO Caroline Ellison Only $6M

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The creators of the Ethereum NFT collection signal growing ambitions, but the comments (and socks) may be roiling some holders.
articles.title: Doodles 'No Longer an NFT Project' and Won’t Cater to Speculators, Co-Founder Says

articles.description: On this panel from NFT Paris 2023 moderated by Decrypt's Dan Roberts, Web3 leads from some of the largest consumer and tech brands discuss their NFT strategies. Marc Mathieu of Salesforce, Tim Walther of VW Group, Eva Assayag of Panerai, and Samir Addamine of Absolute Labs joined the panel.
articles.title: Big Brands Get Serious About NFTs: Salesforce, VW, Panerai, Absolute Labs at NFT Paris

articles.description: At NFT Paris 2023, Decrypt’s Stephen Graves moderated a discussion about NFTs and the entertainment industry with Warner Bros’ NFT head Josh Hackbarth, CyberBrokers founder Josie Bellini, NFT Now founder Matt Medved and Dave Broome, CEO of Orange Comet, which has produced NFTs for Anthony Hopkins and The Walking Dead.
articles.title: NFT Entertainment Revolution: Warner Bros, Orange Comet, CyberBrokers and NFT Now at NFT Paris

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The attacker who drained almost $200 million from Euler Finance has moved some of the stolen funds through mixing protocol Tornado Cash.
articles.title: Euler Finance Hacker Mixes $1.6M in Ethereum on Tornado Cash

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The Knights Who Say Nah aim to draw more people into Web3 with historical artifact preservation.
articles.title: These 'Knights' Will Donate Samurai Sword to Met Museum—After Minting It as an NFT

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The "experiential" Web3 art platform has added Sarah Friend, Jonas Lund, and Serwah Attafuah, among other artists.
articles.title: Gwyneth Paltrow-Backed NFT Art Platform Wild Reveals Latest Artists in Residence

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: While Gnosis itself serves as an open framework, prediction markets are realized in third-party dApps built on top the Gnosis Chain, such as Azuro, Omen, and Reality Card.
articles.title: What Is Gnosis? How Decentralized Prediction Markets Work

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Arbitrum today announced the launch of its native ARB governance token, forming a DAO to steer the technology to the community's ends.
articles.title: Ethereum Layer-2 Solution Arbitrum Announces Token Airdrop, Opens Tech Stack to Devs

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Several key metrics indicate the Tether (USDT) stablecoin is emerging as a key winner from the recent chaos in crypto markets.
articles.title: Tether's Stablecoin Market Cap Now Double USDC After SVB Chaos

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: Circle’s policy lead hopes to use a newly-appointed role on the CFTC’s tech committee to advocate for change amid the latest banking chaos.
articles.title: Banking Chaos a ‘Reminder’ of Fractional-Reserve Risks: Circle Global Policy VP

articles.author: Gabe Nikias
articles.description: The MoonPay CEO wants to get NFTs and crypto into the hands of the masses via slick UX and partnerships with household brands.
articles.title: Moonpay CEO: 'We Really Want to Pass the Mom Test' for Mass NFT Adoption

articles.description: Knights Who Say Nah co-founder and project lead Nick Richey chats with Decrypt's Jason Nelson inside the group's armory of artifacts, shows off a historic Japanese tanto sword, and discusses why the preservation of historical artifacts is the best use case for NFTs.
articles.title: Step Inside the Armory of the NFT Collective 'Knights Who Say Nah'

articles.description: Voltz Labs Co-founder and CEO Simon Jones talks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson at ETH Denver about using DeFi for interest rate swaps, the unfriendly regulatory environment in the US right now, emerging economies becoming crypto hubs, and the "cartoonishly large" market opportunity for DeFi.
articles.title: Voltz Labs CEO: DeFi Innovation Is Moving Offshore Because of US Regulatory Severity

articles.description: MoonPay CEO Ivan Soto-Wright talked to Decrypt's Liam Kelly at NFT Paris about how NFTs are clearly not "waning," how MoonPay works with brands like Puma and Nike to manage their Web3 plays and smart contracts, and how NFTs and crypto will go mainstream when they can integrate in our daily lives—and his prediction that brands will drive that.
articles.title: MoonPay CEO: Next Phase of NFT Adoption Will Come From 'Brands You Love in Your Everyday Life'

articles.description: Brandon Potts, a principal at Web3 VC firm Framework Ventures, spoke to Decrypt's Jason Nelson at ETH Denver about his investment focus, his outlook on crypto regulation right now, and why he's optimistic for the industry even amid the bear market and recent regulatory actions.
articles.title: Framework Ventures Is 'Optimistic That Regulators Are Much More Educated' About Crypto Than in Past

articles.description: Fanny Lakoubay, the founder of art advisory and agency LAL Art, talked to Decrypt's Liam Kelly at NFT Paris about what LAL Art does, how it works with artists, museums, directors, and galleries, and why artists in Web3 have to "reinvent themselves every six months."
articles.title: Why LAL Art Has 'No Interest In Just Putting the Traditional Art Market on the Blockchain'

articles.description: Anjali Young, the co-founder of Abridged and Collab.Land, talked to Decrypt's Jason Nelson at ETH Denver about the origins of Collab.Land and says it erupted thanks to Covid, which created not just new interest in crypto but the need for better tools for DAO member collaboration.
articles.title: Collab.Land Grew 'Because of Covid' Creating Need for DAO Tools: Co-founder Anjali Young

articles.description: Visual artist Mat Collishaw, who uses mixed media to explore beauty, is about to launch Heterosis, a metaverse art experience with dynamic NFTs hosted by OG.Art. He spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about how he came to Web3.
articles.title: Artist Mat Collishaw is Exploring the 'Mutability' of NFTs

articles.description: Samir Addamine, Co-founder and CEO of Web3 CRM software company Absolute Labs, told Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris that big consumer brands are rushing to figure out crypto wallets and how they can harness them for their marketing purposes and to deepen ties with customers.
articles.title: Absolute Labs CEO: Big Brands Are Trying to Understand and Harness Crypto Wallets

articles.description: Pseudonymous NFT collector Gmoney talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about his Web3 luxury brand 9dcc, big brands getting into NFTs, the debate over creator royalty fees, and what will come next to the space.
articles.title: NFT Collector Gmoney: 'Marketplaces Have Nothing to Trade Without Creators'

articles.description: Dispatch is a new Web3 marketing, messaging, and ad tech tool from IEX Group, which also owns the IEX exchange fighting high-frequency trading and made famous in the book "Flash Boys" by Michael Lewis. Dispatch head of product Sean Spector sat down with Decrypt's Liam Kelly at NFT Paris to talk about Dispatch's product vision and why Web2 companies are jumping into Web3.
articles.title: Head of Product for IEX's Dispatch: 'We See Tokens as the Social Graph of Web3'

articles.description: Chris Gonsalves, CEO of esports tournament platform Community Gaming, talks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson at ETH Denver about Web3 gaming, his past stint at ConsenSys, and using smart contracts to get gamers paid instantly. Community Gaming has also just announced the 3XP Gaming Expo, June 8-9 in Pasadena, CA.
articles.title: Community Gaming CEO: Ethereum Smart Contracts Can Solve 'Pain Points' of Gamers Getting Paid

articles.description: Neal Stephenson coined the term “metaverse” in his seminal 1992 sci-fi hit novel “Snow Crash.” Now he’s helming a metaverse blockchain company called Lamina1 and advocating for one free and open metaverse. He spoke to Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves at length about what he got right and wrong in “Snow Crash,” goggles and flat screens, Big Tech, NFTs and digital ownership, and more. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Neal Stephenson Maps Out the Metaverse

articles.description: Omer Amsel, head of Web3 products at crypto custody and settlement provider Fireblocks, told Decrypt's Jason Nelson at ETH Denver about why crypto market cycles are best for building, how Fireblocks is focused on providing "picks and shovels," and why the company still believes in the long-term promise of Web3.
articles.title: Fireblocks Is Laser-Focused on the Picks and Shovels: Web3 Products Lead at ETH Denver

articles.description: Mihai Crasneanu, Co-founder and CEO of Beem, describes Beem as "a mix of YouTube, Twitch, Zoom, and Clubhouse" that runs as a decentralized platform. He talked to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris about how it all works and how the platform is growing.
articles.title: CEO of Video Streaming Platform Beem: Decentralization Lets 'Creators Regain Their Autonomy'

articles.description: Miguel Faus funded his upcoming film "Calladita" via NFT sales and a prize grant from Decentralized Pictures and Steven Soderbergh. He told Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris about how the film process is progressing and how Web3 moves so quickly that the NFT funding model he used is already a thing of the past and other filmmakers need to find other ways to keep pushing the envelope.
articles.title: 'Calladita' Director Says NFT Funding Model He Used Is Already Gone Because Web3 Moves So Fast

articles.description: Coinbase protocols lead Jesse Pollak sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at ETH Denver 2023 to talk about the company's innovation strategy and its plans to keep "iterating quickly" on products like Coinbase NFT and its newly announced Layer-2 blockchain Base and its efforts to become an "on-chain-native company."
articles.title: Coinbase Protocols Lead Talks Plans for Base and NFT Marketplace

articles.description: Josie Bellini, NFT artist and creator of CyberBrokers, tells Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris how CyberBrokers creates "missions and quests" for its holders to complete that lead them to other hubs like Cryptovoxels, Mona, and other projects "so that we're not just in our own silo."
articles.title: How CyberBrokers Creates Quests Across Multiple NFT Communities: Josie Bellini

articles.description: Bolero co-founder and CEO William Bailey tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris how Bolero works, the vision behind letting fans of an artist own a piece of a song, the future for music NFTs, and how Web3 can change the music industry broadly.
articles.title: Web3 Music Platform Bolero Wants to 'Put a Record Label in Everyone's Pocket'
